channel.title: Comments on: Shade of Aran Chant

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description: that was our theme song at aran last night. must have worked because the druid on the terrible connection only blew the raid up (not out, btw) once this time.
item.content:encoded: that was our theme song at aran last night. must have worked because the druid on the terrible connection only blew the raid up (not out, btw) once this time.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
All morning, as I upgraded Le Blog to version 2.0.10 whilst the ftp was timing out and corrupted files spawned everywhere, I was soothed by the Shade of Aran chant in my brain.
Even now, as I go to the <del>grocery</del> liquor store, the chant will go with me, over and over, endlessly looping, until I'm involuntarily committed or deprogrammed.
I sure don't want the raid to blooOOOOOw out, so I won't be moving when Flame Wreath is cast. No way, no how.
item.content:encoded:
All morning, as I upgraded Le Blog to version 2.0.10 whilst the ftp was timing out and corrupted files spawned everywhere, I was soothed by the Shade of Aran chant in my brain.

Even now, as I go to the grocery liquor store, the chant will go with me, over and over, endlessly looping, until I’m involuntarily committed or deprogrammed.

I sure don’t want the raid to blooOOOOOw out, so I won’t be moving when Flame Wreath is cast. No way, no how.

item.title: By: Puhase
item.dc:creator: Puhase
item.description: With the reduction in duration of blizzard and the elementals losing 50% or more of their hp, this begs the question; Will you kill an elemental now?
item.content:encoded:
With the reduction in duration of blizzard and the elementals losing 50% or more of their hp, this begs the question;
Will you kill an elemental now?
